location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 40: Rawson Hart Boddam, Nathaniel Stackhouse, John Torlesse, Robert Sparks, Charles Bourchier, Alexander Callander, John Beaumont and David Carnegie, Council at Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter encloses duplicate copies of a letter dated 20 November 1784 (see the previous item in this volume). Edward Galley is informed that the Morning Staris destined for Bussora [Basra] with packets for the Honourable Company; he is directed not to detain the vessel a moment after it has delivered this letter.and requests the quick departure of the Morning Staronward to Bussora [Basra].
